data.title: asked for white meat three times.........
data.text:
asked for white meat three times, got two boxes wth leg and thighs,  is ths their dea of white meat?.
other part of meals was good and hot, only displeasure was the meat I requested was not there( they had plenty in the store on display)

data.title: Biscuits
data.text: Their biscuits are so yummy, so moist melts in your mouth, with just the right crispness on the outside. I'm sure they're made with lots of butter, however, they are not greasy and the butter they use must be of like a really high end great quality brand, cause the taste and smell are amazingly good. My first bite made me think of like a grandma biscuit expert making them fresh from scratch back there! Yes they are that good. Took some home to try with jam or honey, and they don't get stale they're that fresh.

data.title: Not Good!
data.text: The worse string beans ever. They were very slimy. I love Popeye's. But this one wasn't so good. The chicken and biscuits were great. The staff was ok. Id still recommend eating here. Just check the string beans.

data.title: Good Boneless Chicken
data.text: I hadn't eaten at a Popeye's before. We tried the boneless chicken combos. It was acceptable fast food. The restaurant was clean and the service was quick.

data.title: No parking
data.text:
Never been in smaller parking lot. Had to wait until someone finished their takeout order so I could park. Asked if they had the televised $5 specials. Never heard of them. My employee was helping someone relatively new. In other words. got most of order
correct.

data.title: boneless chicken
data.text: I went there to order the $5 boneless wings with a side and a biscuit that I had just seen advertised on TV. The clerk behind the counter said they don't have that and had not had them in weeks. To me, I didn't care how long they have not had something. I just saw them advertised. Why do they pay for TV advertising and they don't have them? I did order the 3 tender dinner with fries and a biscuit. The fries and biscuit were good, but the tenders were under cooked. I was not happy with my meal.

data.title: Literally only went for the Cheetos bites
data.text: Well, and a water. We were in transit and thirsty so my husband just pulled in for a water. But we saw those Mac-and-cheese Cheetos whatever-dee-evers on the menu and had to try. Weird. Good. Addicting. Otherwise a typical drive-thru experience.

data.title: Wonderful Service
data.text: I was really impressed by the service of all the associates but, mostly the manager.  She came out and greeted all the dine in customers and made sure everyone was satisfied with their meals. She saw I had a big family and gave us 4 extra pieces of chicken.  The food was fresh and the price wasn't jacked up because it was in a tourist spot.

data.title: Awful service!
data.text:
Attitudes and service we're just plain AWFUL! From window teller to server.. the rudeness was such we left our paid drink behind.This is coming from someone who never likes giving negative feedback as no matter the place, there is always room for improvement and will focus on the positive.
Hopefully, owner will hire people who REALLY want to work cause service like this will only take a place out of business... SAD!

data.title: GREAT fast food
data.text: Was looking for some good fast food while out sightseeing, and stopped her for a quick bite. The wife had never been her, but I have eaten at Popeyes before. The Manager on duty, Todd, was a great spokesman for the chain and even offered a free sample of the spicy chicken. The food was good and hot and now Popeyes has a new fan.

data.title: Friendliest service !!!
data.text: I love Popeyes chicken !!!! But this location has the best customer service and the friendliest staff I've ever seen. Other stores could learn a few things from there customer service.

data.title: Like the advertisement says---I love that chicken from Popeye's.
data.text: What can you say about the chicken at this place. I say consistently excellent at affordable prices. I prefer the Hot & spicy but I do get the Mild once in a while. All good.

data.title: Good food ,good service ,poor location
data.text: My wife and I are in Florida from the UK . Hired a Harley and rode up to Daytona beach for a day out. Popped in to popeyes on the way out Back to Orlando. Never eaten at a popeyes before so we asked the girl a few questions about the menu. She was spot on and very helpful, food was great we had the big box meal each and thoroughly enjoyed it. Location, as other reviews have mentioned, some people didn't seem to be ordering food but just hanging out . Maybe the management need to be a bit more forthright with these people as i could see why it would make other customers feel uneasy. Overall, good food and great service.

data.title: Awesome Chicken. Watch out for the homeless
data.text: We stopped in for a quick bite at this location. The service was quick and fast and the chicken was good also. There are a lot of homeless hanging out asking for money and hanging out to close to the cars. Lock your doors.

data.title: Poor Service In A Sketchy Location
data.text: I stopped here for dinner last night and was left with a pretty bad taste in my mouth, so to speak. The food, as always was hot and fresh, typical of Popeye's. The service was the worst of any Popeye's I've been. The cashier was rude, loud and condescending. The manger was inattentive and refused to acknowledge any of the problems that were happening in her store and with her employees. I would reiterate what other reviewers have written, a number of questionable people kept ducking in, walking around the dining room, getting sodas and generally disrupting business and guests. Some "lady's" appeared to be using the dining room as a "waiting room", meeting male associates; I'm trying to be as nice about this as possible. I'm not trying to be insensitive to the seeming overwhelming homeless population in the immediate area of this Popeye's, but if you are traveling and aren't familiar with this town, think carefully about just casually walking into this place with your family. That's not to say that I felt threatened, I just don't want to hang out with that much of the local flavor and to that intensity. I want to experience the local culture but not be thrust into its bowels, which is where, unfortunately this place exists. Every Popeye's I've been to has had great food and this one is no exception, my problem isn't with the quality of food or the cleanliness of the store, it was very clean, my main problem was with the service. My advice to the staff is to tighten up, this is not a game, you're running a business so act like it. Your customers are the reason you're getting a paycheck so respect them. My advice to you as a customer is, you don't really want Popeye's so much that you would subject yourself to the overwhelming negativity of this place. Get your Popeye's fix somewhere else.

data.title: Dinner when I don't wanna cook
data.text: Delicious chicken... especially their spicy menu.  We like the red beans and rice, green beans, and biscuits.  Yum.

data.title: Poor customer service
data.text:
Went on a Friday night to pick up dinner for our family to start a weekend getaway. Food was amazing, fresh & HOT, but customer service was extremely poor. The cashier was rude, disrespectful  & all around used poor customer service towards us & other customers. After ordering food, waiting & receiving our food I asked the cashier for some ranch dipping sauce...she had the nerve to scream to another employee " I don't know why this chick is asking me for ranch when she could ask you all! Get her some ranch!" Rude! 
Restaurant was clean!

data.title: expected better
data.text: First time eating at Popeye's. Everyone back home (Chicago) raves how good it is. I wasn't that impressed. The person in the drive thru rushed us to get our order. Couldn't even finish glancing at the menu before shes telling our total and asking us to drive ahead. Twice we had to tell her we weren't finished ordering.

data.title: Very impressed!
data.text: This was my families first time eating Popeye's and it was excellent. The food came out very fast!! We ordered for a family of 5 and our order was completely ready within 2 minutes. We were astonished. The service was excellent!! (We ate on the evening of 4/4/15) We couldn't catch their names but the whole crew deserved a huge thumbs up!! -Justin Williams

data.title: Great fresh food
data.text: We went around lunch time, they people were very nice an friendly.. They food was fresh, an great!i so not think there is anything bad I could say about this location.
